review: I cannot be more happy with my amazon fire tv.One thing that I love about this device is that it can detect my wireless N router signal.  My PS3 does not have the wireless card that can detect N signals and is very poor at doing wireless streaming.  However, Amazon's fire tv outperforms even my old laptop.I was lucky to get the Halloween deal and got it for just $84.I have recommend it to friends and one of them told he bought it from Staples at the same price I did.  To be fair, I think is worth the $99 price tag.
